Reviews.Title: Best laptop for the money
Reviews.Author: Alex Aguilar "alex"
Reviews.Content: I had previously bought an Asus netbook so when my mom told me to get her a laptop for basic use(FB, web browsing, music, etc)I immediately went to Asus. this computer is fast, and has a very nice design that is not glossy so you dont have to worry about fingerprints too much. Very easy to use and I still have not noticed any flaws after a week of use. I cannot say whether this computer is ideal for word processing and such programs as this laptop is not being used for that. But as an entertainment device, this things gets an A+. Asus nails it again.

ProductInfo.Features:
AMD A6-3420 Quad Core , 4GB DDR3 1333 MHz SDRAM
15.6" HD display with 1366 x 768 resolution for a crystal-clear view
500GB 5400RPM,WAVE Keyboard with number key pad,Webcam
ATI HD 6520G,VGA, 2 - USB 2.0, 1-USB 3.0
DL DVDRW/CD-RW reads and writes a variety of formats
ProductInfo.Name: ASUS X53Z Series 15.6" Laptop, AMD A6-3420 Quad Core Processor, 4GB, 500GB, WiFi+WebCam -Mocha
